data.text: I dare each and every one of you to choose love…and to go listen to  my multilingual project! What a dream come true to be able to share this with you. #idareyou is OUT NOW! https://t.co/7lu3UvpRKk https://t.co/wmtwygUFGW

It's Christmas time, y'all! Tune in tonight to @NBCTheVoice for our holiday special! Grab some hot chocolate, gather around the fire, and come listen to some holiday tunes ☺️❤️ #TheVoice #TeamKelly https://t.co/gwUZ5HGj3t
Watching my kids opening their presents is by far my favorite part of Christmas 😍 What's your favorite Christmas morning memory with your kids?? #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/cRevA88oF5

So much fun celebrating the tree lighting ceremony for #RockCenterXMAS! 🎄❤️ 

Photo: Chris Haston/NBC https://t.co/0nERJ4tQ3c

Are you ready for a very merry #RockCenterXMAS?! @BrettEldredge & I will be performing our newest Christmas collab #UnderTheMistletoe for the very first time! Tune in TONIGHT at 8/7c on @NBC. 🎄 https://t.co/4hlVXk3K8m

I want to see your best ❤️ Under The Mistletoe ❤️ moments. Head to https://t.co/JkwK95CPK4 to submit your photos and videos to be included in my upcoming fan video! #UnderTheMistletoe https://t.co/eFyDTE0qZV

In 9 days, the @OfficialEllenK Morning Show will broadcast for 13 straight hours on #GivingTuesday! All to raise funds for @ChildrensLA! Thanks for the support @KellyClarkson! We love you! https://t.co/w0xSi9WeU9 #EllenKMorningShow https://t.co/qH5iUGYqIi
Hear contemporary holiday hits by @MariahCarey, @MichaelBuble, @kellyclarkson, @PTXofficial, and more on Holly. 🎄 https://t.co/zqoMIHWgYC https://t.co/FLxPQimpKT
Who's ready for the holidays!? I know I am! 🙋🏼‍♀️🎄❤️ Make sure to add my newest Christmas song #AllIWantForChristmasIsYou to all of your playlists! https://t.co/HM7QbwjDYU https://t.co/jWVmCL0mU7
It’s voting time and y'all better be voting for @RyanDGallagher! He’s an Opera singer, people!! #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/A95hiP40iq
MIC DROP MOMENT @RyanDGallagher!! #TeamKelly #VoiceKnockouts
I’m SOOOOO excited to have @camiclune on #TeamKelly now!! Let’s do this girl! #VoiceKnockouts
I couldn’t help but get up and dance! You had me out of my seat @tannergmusic!! #TeamKelly #VoiceKnockouts
.@marisa_corvo, you made me love that song even more than I already do!! You did @Cher (and me!!) so proud!! #TeamKelly #VoiceKnockouts
Last night of knockouts! Let's have some fun 🎉  #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/EwAicNGHgA
If y’all ever get a chance to photobomb @Usher... I highly suggest you do it 😂😂 #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/FeSwXFnZcl
You betta sing that song @SidKingsley!! Wow!! #TeamKelly #TheVoice
My jaw is on the floor @DeSzMusicOffic! You brought everything and more to your performance! #TeamKelly #VoiceKnockouts
It’s knockouts time! Let’s do this!!! #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/VSth20P7TV
Stand up if y’all are ready for some music tonight! #TheVoice #TeamKelly https://t.co/CpPy3Rxdx8
.@Usher is in the house with #TeamKelly tonight!! Are y’all ready?! #TheVoice https://t.co/D8fI5G8BLZ
It's beginning to look a lot like... #RockCenterXMAS! See the annual tree lighting Wednesday, December 2 at 8PM ET on @NBC. 🎄 https://t.co/A19o8m2KR2
There are more knockouts next week! That means more @Usher too 😂 😍#TeamKelly #TheVoice
I think @Usher has me beat in the coolness factor y’all 😂It’s knockouts time on @NBCTheVoice! #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/VOIBSqjoHi
Welcome back @nickjonas! @NBCTheVoice #TheVoice https://t.co/PWOr1VBdXz
I’m so proud of Team Kelly y’all! Let’s get ready for the knockouts with our mega mentor @Usher! #TeamKelly #TheVoice
Y’all didn’t just blow the roof off… you blew down the entire studio!! It's not easy to do a @CelineDion song, but y'all did it!!! So proud!! @RyanDGallagher @marisa_corvo ❤️ #TeamKelly
Y’all I have no idea how pirates sailed ships with an eye patch... 😂🤷🏼‍♀️ The final battle rounds happens tonight on @NBCTheVoice! #TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/x7unwp4pLI
Here’s something to make y’all laugh! Lord knows we need it ❤️#TeamKelly #TheVoice https://t.co/wzVn9jgCBq
Thank you to my incredible team for getting me ready for the battles! Y’all are the best 😘#TeamKelly #TheVoice #VoiceGlam https://t.co/tKoWHg2gWP
#AllIWantForChristmasIsYou - Team Kelly https://t.co/VfeuFYUKwl
All smiles today 😊 You know why?! It's Friday AND my new Christmas song is out! 🎶🎄https://t.co/HM7QbwjDYU #AllIWantForChristmasIsYou https://t.co/ncy5cUm7A1
'Tis the season to play Christmas music! 😜🎄🎶 My new song #AllIWantForChristmasIsYou is available everywhere! Listen to it now at https://t.co/bE347DoH9b. https://t.co/tyW2fgNQ4g
Are y'all ready for some new Christmas music!? ❤️💚 Here's a sneak peek of #AllIWantForChristmasIsYou before it's out tomorrow. Pre-save it now! https://t.co/Rgcm2mvY7w https://t.co/0mADXro15P
The performances were incredible tonight y’all! Especially #TeamKelly 😉You’re the best @LeonBridges! #VoiceBattles #TeamKelly
Y’all worked so hard on that performance and it paid off! I’m so proud of y’all both @skylaralyvia @tannergmusic #TeamKelly #VoiceBattles
That was a beautiful performance by two beautiful humans! Way to go @DeSzMusicOffic @josephsoulmusic 🙌🏻 #TeamKelly #VoiceBattles
This is what a photoshoot in 2020 looks like.. 😂 There’s more @LeonBridges with #TeamKelly tonight on @NBCTheVoice! #VoiceBattles https://t.co/xUUg8BlthU
WE GOT A STEAL, PEOPLE!!! I’m so excited to have you on Team Kelly @SidKingsley! #VoiceBattles #TeamKelly

You both killed a tough song in two languages 🤯

Y’all were the definition of teamwork @elizamoramusic @thatmaddiec! 👏🏻  #TeamKelly #VoiceBattles
